page.title: 10Tourism
page.content: In our unit block there are one or two tourist attractions. There is the lighthouse which is situated on the sea wall close to the sluice gates for the flood drain.The people who live there keep wild birds in a pen and it is quite interesting to look at them.Then there is the Battery which is very interesting as there are plans to make it into some kind of military museum.There is a group of people who play at wargames there and dress up as soldiers. The riverbank and drains attract lots of fishermen and there are sometimes competitions held. There is a football pitch and cricket pitch which attract teams from other villages. We did a census of tourists and found that we attracted 35 people a day.
